column17: Illuminate and your homes and hearts with your prayer for Good fortune and happiness this auspicious Diwali with this traditional Pooja Thali. This Basket weave thali is lined with a golden fabric and Red bandhini fabric with exquisite thread work Ganeshji and Red flowers in the center.The thali is lined with a colourful rope lace.The Thali comes with a Pooja kit containing all essentials required for Diwali Pooja like Diya Chandan Powder dry fruits Betel Nut Shagun thread ( Mauli ) Misree spices camphor Rice and Kumkum.The Thali is accompanied with Shagun Pooja motifs for pasting on the gates to welcome Laxmi ji as a tradition.Thali also comes with miniature Ganesh Ji and Laxmi ji in Terracota for the Pooja.Brand : Aapno Rajasthan.Disclaimer: These home decoratives products are handmade. There might be a slight variation in the design pattern or colour combination.
